Text:
Ok, so since this torrent reached 99.9% weeks ago and STILL has yet to finish. I've decided to just dump the whole idea that it ever will completely download. 

I'm gonna go ahead and try to still use the update files that DID download even though this torrent didn't finish downloading completely (100%). It's worth a shot.

And lastly, thanks for some of these files, dave1sfx, but you're a dumbass.
